org_pef_text.pef2text
Class ConfigurableEmbosser

java.lang.Object
  org_pef_text.pef2text.ConfigurableEmbosser
All Implemented Interfaces:
AbstractEmbosser
public class ConfigurableEmbosser
extends java.lang.Object
implements AbstractEmbosser

Create a configurable embosser. This class can handle standard 6-dot embossers using us ascii.

Since:
1.0
Version:
22 okt 2008
Author:
Joel Hakansson, TPB
